content: **set of knitted jacket with raglan sleeves and turtle neck hat and socks with nordic pattern for baby and children in drops merino extra fine** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see first snow hat pattern here 1 see first snow socks pattern here 2 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ jacket **size** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years finished measurements bust 50-56-62 68-74 cm / 19¾ -22 -24⅜ 26¾ -29⅛ full length 28-30-34 38-41 cm / 11 -11¾ -13⅜ 15 -16⅛ **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 150-150-200 200-200 g color no 07 light brown mix 50 g for all sizes color no 01 off-white 50 g in for all sizes color no 06 brown mix 50 g for all sizes color no 15 light gray/green drops double pointed needles and circular needle 60 cm / 24 size 4 5 mm / us 7 or size needed to get correct gauge drops double pointed needles and circular needle 60 cm / 24 size 3 5 mm/ us 4 for rib drops wooden button no 503 6-6-7 7-7 pcs see matching hat 3 and socks 4 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b19-33-first-snow-hat 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b19-29-first-snow-socks 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b19-33-hat-with-pattern 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b19-29-socks-with-pattern
